item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my About page! My name is Selvakumar and I am a DevOps Engineer based in India. I have always been passionate about DevOps and Security, and I have been fortunate enough to turn that passion into a successful career. With 1 year 6 months of experience in the field, I’m honing my skills and developing a deep understanding of DevOps work. Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work with a diverse range of clients, from individuals to large corporations.
